description:
The Run+ Ultralight Mini socks are durable, breathable, and odor-resistant socks for all-round running performance. The ultra-lightweight, quick-drying design is anatomically sculpted for premium fit and comfort, with key support zones in the Achilles and instep to keep the sock in place. Reinforcements in the heel and toe increase durability, while the seamless toe reduces bulk and prevents blisters.

Inspired by nature, Icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Run+ Mini Socks - Ultralight Cushion - Mens
